Action.author: ashutosh_kumar
Action.body: CFSSL does not integrate with LDAP out of the box.

Action.author: ashutosh_kumar
Action.body: CFSSL supports POSTgRES DB out of the box. Looking into that now. It supports MQSQL also out of the box.

Action.author: ashutosh_kumar
Action.body: Investigated CFSSL. Investigating letsencrypt now. CFSSL meets basic requirements but it is not active. letsencrypt forks CFSSL and is Linux Foundation Project.

Action.author: ashutosh_kumar
Action.body: Keith Smith is working on letsebcrypt prototype. Hence dropped this for now. Have not closed it now as I might pick it up later.

Action.author: ashutosh_kumar
Action.body: We have decided to use CFSSL libraries for Certificate management , which includes ECert and TCert generation and letsencrypt for other boundary use cases where there is need for pseudo real time domain validation in certificate creation process.

Action.author: ashutosh_kumar
Action.body: Based on above decision , moving it to complete state.
